quote: She was covered in sweat, and her body odor filled my nostrils. But her smell wasn't repulsive, believe me! It was rather alluring. It was tempting, a little foul, sour, yet arousing.
quote_letters: SHE WAS COVERED IN SWEAT AND HER BODY ODOR FILLED MY NOSTRILS BUT HER SMELL WASNT REPULSIVE BELIEVE ME IT WAS RATHER ALLURING IT WAS TEMPTING A LITTLE FOUL SOUR YET AROUSING
